Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add agent version tracking and implement ToKeyValueString extension method

- Added Version field to AgentSettings in appsettings.json (v1.0.1)
- Updated Agent Worker to include AgentVersion in heartbeat SystemInfo
- Created ObjectExtensions.cs with ToKeyValueString() extension method
  - Uses reflection to automatically format all properties as Key=Value
  - Automatically masks sensitive fields (Password, PrivateKey)
  - Automatically truncates long strings (Token, Certificate, Output)
  - Automatically expands dictionaries and lists
  - Automatically formats DateTime objects
- Updated all 16 DTO classes across 6 files to use extension method
  - AgentDTOs.cs (4 classes)
  - AuthDTOs.cs (3 classes)
  - CertificateDTOs.cs (3 classes)
  - CommandDTOs.cs (2 classes)
  - DeploymentDTOs.cs (4 classes)
  - InventoryDTOs.cs (4 classes)
- Updated CLAUDE.md with ToKeyValueString pattern documentation
- Eliminated ~480 lines of repetitive ToString() code

Benefits:
- Future-proof: New properties automatically appear in ToString()
- Consistent: All DTOs follow same pattern
- Secure: Sensitive data automatically masked
- Maintainable: Logic lives in one place

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
